tooltips.los_clear_at_critical_point: Line of sight clear at critical point (margin {diff}m)

success.new_session_started: New session started. Ready to load a KMZ or draw on the map.
success.kmz_loaded_select_tower: KMZ loaded. Select a tower on the map to start.
success.found_candidate_sites: Found {count} candidate sites for the repeater.
success.tower_selected_for_simulation: Tower '{name}' selected. Click 'Simulate' in the panel.
success.location_found: Location found and marked on the map.

errors.session_start_fail: Critical failure starting new session. Try reloading the page.
errors.select_kmz: Please select a KMZ file first.
errors.invalid_data_or_session: Invalid data or session not started. Try resetting.
errors.run_study_first: You need to run a study first.
errors.no_coverage_to_search: No active coverage area to search. Activate the main antenna or a repeater.
errors.session_not_started_for_draw: Session not started. Reset the application before drawing.
errors.session_not_started: Session not started. Load a KMZ or reset the application.
errors.nothing_to_export: Nothing to export. Run a simulation with an antenna or repeater.
errors.los_diagnostic_fail: Failed line of sight diagnosis for target {name}.
errors.los_source_must_have_signal: SOURCE: Select a target (pivot or irripump) WITH SIGNAL.
errors.invalid_coordinate_format: Invalid coordinate format. Use DMS (e.g., 19¬∞26'S 44¬∞29'W) or Decimal (e.g., -19.44 -44.49).
errors.draw_pivot_radius_too_small: Radius too small. Drawing cancelled. Click to set a new center.
errors.generic_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

info.no_towers_found: No towers found in the KMZ. You can add an antenna manually by clicking on the map.
info.los_mode_on: 'Find Repeater Locations' mode activated. Select an uncovered pivot (red).
info.target_pivot_selected: Target pivot selected: {name}. Searching for locations...
info.no_promising_sites_found: No promising sites found with the current criteria.
info.draw_pivot_step1: Drawing Mode: Click on the map to set the pivot's center.
info.draw_pivot_step2: Center defined. Click again to set the pivot's radius.
info.draw_pivot_still_active: Drawing Mode still active. Click to draw a new pivot.
info.analyzing_targets_from_source: Analyzing line of sight for {count} targets from '{source}'...
info.no_uncovered_targets_in_radius: No uncovered targets found within the {limit} radius.
info.targets_ignored_by_distance: ({count} targets ignored for being beyond the {limit} limit)
info.edit_mode_activated: Edit mode activated. Drag the pins to move. Right-click to remove.
info.positions_updated_resimulate: Positions updated. Run the simulation again to see the impact on coverage.
info.los_mode_step1_source: PIVOT-TO-PIVOT DIAGNOSIS MODE: Select the SOURCE target (with signal).
info.los_source_selected: SOURCE: {name} selected. Now select the DESTINATION target (without signal).
info.los_source_already_selected: SOURCE: {name} is already the source. Select the DESTINATION target.
info.los_source_changed: SOURCE CHANGED to: {name}. Select the DESTINATION target.
info.los_result_clear_critical: Line of sight {source} ‚Üí {target} (Dist: {distance}) ‚úÖ Clear at critical point.
info.los_new_source_prompt: Select a new SOURCE target (with signal) or deactivate the mode.
info.draw_sector_pivot_step1: Sector Mode: Click on the map to set the pivot's center.
info.draw_sector_pivot_step2: Center defined. Move the mouse to adjust radius/direction and click again to finish.
info.draw_sector_pivot_still_active: Sector Mode still active. Click to draw a new pivot.
info.draw_sector_cancelled: Sector pivot drawing cancelled. Click to set a new center.
info.draw_pacman_step1: Arc Sector Mode: Click on the map to set the pivot's center.
info.draw_pacman_step2: Center defined. Click to set the radius and initial angle.
info.draw_pacman_step3: Radius and initial angle defined. Click to set the final angle.
info.draw_pacman_still_active: Arc Sector Mode still active. Click to draw a new pivot.
info.draw_pacman_cancelled: Arc Sector pivot drawing cancelled. Click to set a new center.
info.draw_irripump_step1: Irripump Mode: Click on the map to add an Irripump.
info.draw_irripump_still_active: Irripump Drawing Mode still active. Click to add another one.

confirm.remove_pivot: Are you sure you want to remove the pivot "{name}"? The associated area will also be removed.
confirm.remove_irripump: Are you sure you want to remove the Irripump "{name}"?
confirm.change_los_source: You have already selected {sourceName} as the source. Do you want to change the source to {newName}? Previous diagnostic lines will be removed.
